# NSScrollView.Elasticity

**Enumeration**

These constants determine the elasticity behavior for an axis of the scrollview.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Elasticity
```

## Constants

- **NSScrollView.Elasticity.automatic**: Automatically determine whether to allow elasticity on this axis.
- **NSScrollView.Elasticity.none**: Disallow scrolling beyond document bounds on this axis.
- **NSScrollView.Elasticity.allowed**: Allow content to be scrolled past its bounds on this axis in an elastic fashion.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSScrollView.FindBarPosition**: These constants define the position of the find bar in relation to the scroll view.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
